titleStmt.title: Astrea. Part 1. a romance / written in French by Messire Honoré D'Urfe ; and translated by a person of quality.
Astrée. English
titleStmt.author: Urfé, Honoré d', 1567-1625.
Davies, John, 1625-1693.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W.W. for H. Moseley, T. Dring, and H. Herringman ...,

notesStmt.note: Volume 3 has special t.p. The third and last volume of Astrea a romance ... London: Printed for Hum. Mosely, Tho. Dring and H. Herringman, 1658.
To the reader signed: J.D. [i.e. John Davies] Cf. BM.
